titles.title: A resolution to express the sense of the House of Representatives that the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs should rescind certain regulations relating to payment of expenses for travel to Veterans' Administration facilities.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary: 5/6/1987--Introduced. States that the Administrator of Veterans Affairs should rescind certain regulations authorizing the reimbursement of travel expenses for travel to a Veterans Administration facility for the purpose of rehabilitation, counseling, or other medical treatment or care and reinstate previous regulations.
